resources.string: [zh-CN]This reference app is the starting point for any new patient medical or consumer mobile app. It is made up of configurable common components which are all part of the CDP2 Platform. It will help accelerate your app development, harmonize UX across Philips and ensures appropriate integration with HSDP.

[zh-CN]AppInfra is the components top level module. It gathers all the modules delivered by the AppInfra Common Component into one single structure. AppInfra facilitates dependency injection into common components and other software pieces that make use of the AppInfra functionalities.

[zh-CN]Whenever users find any difficulty in using the app, they can use the Consumer Care feature to get the issues resolved. The app provides a number of ways the users can access Consumer Care support, such as live chat, e-mail, call, tweet, Facebook post, and so on.

[zh-CN]Connectivity feature in Reference App, provides the ability to pair the mobile application with a reference device using Bluetooth capability for capturing the data from the device to the mobile application.

[zh-CN]Data Services is a common component that acts as a gateway to data core. It will provide synchronization with application data base for the below support the following types of data -\n
  • Moments, Consents, Insights, Push notification and user characteristics.

[zh-CN]In App Purchase feature in Reference App, provides the ability to buy products from the app for the users, which would give users the convenience of shopping anytime-anywhere. This approach also will boost marketing and sales.

[zh-CN]Product registration is a common component, which facilitates the user to create/login into My Philips account and Register a Normal Product where by providing CTN Number, Serial Number(Mandatory) and Date of Purchase.
[zh-CN]UI Toolkit is a component that provides UI controls that are present in the designs provided by the design team on all the screens of the mobile application.

[zh-CN]User registration feature in Reference App provides the ability of registering a new user accessing the mobile application, for logging into the application using valid organization social media specific credentials.

[zh-CN]"Special offers, promotions and first hand information about new product releases.
Tailored for you!

Join 140.000 of your peers now!"

[zh-CN]AppInfra is the component\'s top level module. It gathers all the modules delivered by the AppInfra Common Component into one single structure. AppInfra facilitates dependency injection into common components and other software pieces that make use of the AppInfra functionalities.

[zh-CN]Connectivity feature in Reference App, provides the ability to pair the mobile application with a reference device using Bluetooth capability for capturing the data from the device to the mobile application

[zh-CN]Whenever users find any difficulty in using the app, they can use the Consumer Care feature to get the issues resolved. The app provides a number of ways the users can access Consumer Care support, such as live chat, e-mail, call, tweet, Facebook post, and so on.

[zh-CN]Data Services is a common component that acts as a gateway to data core. It will provide synchronization with application data base for the below support the following types of data: Moments, Consents, Insights, Push notification and user characteristics

[zh-CN]In App Purchase feature in Reference App, provides the ability to buy products from the app for the users, which would give users the convenience of shopping anytime-anywhere. This approach also will boost marketing and sales

[zh-CN]Product registration is a common component, which facilitates the user to create/login into My Philips account and Register a Normal Product where by providing CTN Number, Serial Number(Mandatory) and Date of Purchase
[zh-CN]UI Toolkit is a component that provides UI controls that are present in the designs provided by the design team on all the screens of the mobile application

[zh-CN]User registration feature in Reference App provides the ability of registering a new user accessing the mobile application, for logging into the application using valid organization / social media specific credentials
[zh-CN]You can make Philips purchases or via 3rd party retailers here.
[zh-CN]You can contact Philips consumer care here. Consumer Care is the destination for all Philips questions, product information and reviews.

[zh-CN]This reference app is the starting point for any new patient medical or consumer mobile app. It is made up of configurable common components which are all part of the CDP2 Platform. It will help accelerate your app development, harmonize UX across Philips and ensures appropriate integration with HSDP.
[zh-CN]Wait..While we fetch your sleep data from device

[zh-CN]ReferenceApp is a base platform used by all propositions to develop and maintain features both generic and specific to the propositions. App infra, Data Gateway, App FWK, and UIToolkit allow Apps to be created from uApps and UI-less services/libraries. ReferenceApp acts as a foundation over which CDP2 uApps and proposition specific uApps are integrated to form individual apps.

[zh-CN]This app integrates the common components required to develop new IoT solutions for acceleration across Philips. It is the first reference for the development of all new patient medical or consumer mobile apps.
[zh-CN]Designers, developers and business leaders across Philips.
[zh-CN]Reference App comprises all of the configurable common components that are part of the CDP2 platform.
[zh-CN]It provides all the reference information and tools needed to accelerate and harmonize UX development and ensure appropriate HSDP integration.
[zh-CN]The UX has been fully approved by Philips Design and will soon be in DLS.
[zh-CN]The complete platform is tagged and delivers data to monitor &amp; improve your proposition.
[zh-CN]The Security &amp; Privacy actions of the complete platform are fully in line with Philips rule.
[zh-CN]Localization of your proposition is enabled by the platform, including China.
[zh-CN]<html>The CDP<sup><small>2<small>&<sup> platform is fully integrated with HSDP and IT to ensure all functionalities are enabled end-2-end within the Philips landscape.</html>
您输入或选择的参数值无效。请选择适当参数值，然后重新启动
[zh-CN]I allow Philips to store binary data
[zh-CN]I allow Philips to use my mobile application usage statistics
[zh-CN]I allow Philips to use my data for Coaching purposes
[zh-CN]The actual content of the binary consent help text here
我允许飞利浦收集我的应用程序资料，以帮助改进应用程序功能、完善应用程序、个性化应用程序、整合社交媒体并显示相关内容和广告。

Cookie 声明

本应用程序使用 Adobe Analytics，它是由 Adobe Systems Software Ireland Limited (“Adobe”) 提供的分析服务。Adobe Analytics 使用“cookies”或类似技术（位于应用程序中的文本文件），以帮助应用程序分析其总体流量特征。通过将 cookie 所产生有关该应用程序使用情况的信息传达给 Adobe，其设置确保在地理定位之前将 IP 地址匿名化，且在存储之前由某通用 IP 地址代替。Adobe 将代表飞利浦使用这一信息来评估您对该应用程序的使用情况，编写应用程序活动相关报告，并向飞利浦提供与该应用程序活动相关的其他服务以及应用程序的使用情况。Adobe 不会将您的 IP 地址与 Adobe 所持有的任何其他资料相关联。如果您在关闭此屏幕后选择退出，就可以防止 Adobe 和飞利浦收集并使用资料（cookie 和 IP 地址）。
[zh-CN]The actual content of the coaching consent help text here

在您同意的前提下，飞利浦集团公司可能会通过电子邮件、短信以及移动应用程序和社交媒体等其他数字渠道与您联系，向您提供促销宣传。为了能够根据您的偏好和行为量身定制宣传内容并提供最佳个性化体验，我们可能会分析和合并您的个人资料。这些资料可能包括： 

您向我们提供的资料
您想主动与我们分享的资料，如：您的姓名、出生日期或年龄、电子邮件地址、实际地址、国家/地区、性别、电话号码、社交媒体个人资料。

我们通过您与飞利浦的互动获得的资料
有关您的交互和使用飞利浦数字频道的资料，如社交媒体、网站、电子邮件、应用程序和互联产品。该数据可能包括：IP 地址、Cookie、设备信息、您点击的信息、位置详情以及您访问的网站

飞利浦将为您提供随时撤回同意的机会。
有关详细信息，请阅读飞利浦隐私声明和飞利浦 Cookie 声明。
[zh-CN]The actual content of the moment consent help text here
[zh-CN]The actual content of the research and analytics consent help text here
[zh-CN]I allow Philips to store my data in cloud
[zh-CN]I allow Philips to use my data for Research and Analytics purposes
[zh-CN]You can make Philips purchases or via 3rd party retailers here.
[zh-CN]You can contact Philips consumer care here. Consumer Care is the destination for all Philips questions product informations and reviews.
将保修期延长为 24 个月。\n享受门店购买飞利浦商品 10% 折扣。\n免费获取产品附件
一封包含延长保修合同的电子邮件已发送至您的电子邮箱地址
您的保修期已延长到明年
[zh-CN]We’ve detected that you have rooted the device or jailbroken, thereby making it easier for others to access your data and no security on your application data.
[zh-CN]We’ve detected that you have jailbroken and not activated screenlock, thereby making it easier for others to access your data. We recommend enabling your screenlock.
[zh-CN]We’ve detected the screenlock of your mobile phone is to enabled, thereby making it easier for others to access your data. We recommend enabling your screenlock.
根据我的喜好和上网行为接收飞利浦的促销宣传
